MedicalDrones.Name: Energy Converter
MedicalDrones.Description: Consumes 5 energy points to restore 2% of maximum HP every second.

MedicalDrones.Name: Dynamo Drone
MedicalDrones.Description: Fills up 5% of maximum Energy every 2 seconds.

MedicalDrones.Name: Healer Drone
MedicalDrones.Description: Restores 1% of maximum HP every 4 seconds.
